definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program

sentences.english: But when you do a dimensional analysis, you better be careful.
sentences.chinese: 但我們必須謹慎地進行，量綱分析。

sentences.english: Each term of the Bernoulli equation has the dimension of force per unit area.
sentences.chinese: 伯努利方程中的每一項的量綱都是單位面積上的力。
量綱在這兒指的是什麼？

sentences.english: I say speed, and that means the dimensions of speed.
sentences.chinese: 對於速度來說，這就表示速度的量綱。

sentences.english: Based on dimensionless analysis, the experiment facility, which can simulate VIV of piggyback pipelines, is newly designed.
sentences.chinese: 基於量綱分析設計了子母管結構渦激振動的模擬實驗。
